attributes.action: The Transcript of Jeremy Corbyn’s meetings with Barnier and Tusk and Verhofstadt
attributes.additional_details: Meetings in Brussels in the last two years
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn as Leader of the Opposition in Her Majesty’s Government should inform  the electorate on what he has said in those meetings with the Eu Negotiators

rejection.details: This would be a matter for Jeremy Corbyn, and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
